stories.title: Manipulating the Climate: The Geopolitical Risks
Global AI Weather Forecaster Makes Predictions in Seconds

stories.text:
“You can’t improve what you don’t measure.” — Peter Drucker

With the global influencer marketing market valued at a record $13.8 Billion in 2021 , it's more important than ever for creators to access and own verified metrics.

It's hard for the 46M+ long tail creators to get an aggregated and influencer marketing-ready view of their social media analytics;

Social Analytics APIs unlock of trove of advanced metrics and dimensions, yet they're hard to access and manipulate;

It's critical for creators to display true/verified metrics when brands are searching and auditing for their next campaign;

▶ I've been working on the side to solve this problem and today I'm very happy to unveil what has kept my late evenings busy for the past 10 months:

ABSOLUTE CREATORS

The mission is to provide the 46M+ long tail creators with unmatched marketing-ready #analytics and tools to help them grow and engage in co-marketing campaigns.

Working with publicly accessible APIs, the current prototype app enables advanced Instagram analytics. IG Stories, Twitter and YouTube in the works.TikTok marketing APIs only cover ads at the moment.

If you manage an IG account connected to a Facebook page, you can to test it today — free iOS prototype app link https://apple.co/3HVqj3V

Of course there will be a #web3 layer, starting with collecting an Absolute OG NFT if you're one of the first 100 users.
